name: qilvgallery
description: Make a gallery from a web page
author: Gissehel

scripts.ver: git checkout -- src/version.js; echo "export const version='$([ "$(git name-rev --tags --name-only HEAD)" == "undefined" ] && echo -n "" || echo -n "$(git name-rev --tags --name-only HEAD) - ")$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)$([ -z "$(git status --porcelain)" ] && echo -n "" || echo -n "*")';" > src/version.js
scripts.buildver: yarn ver && yarn build && yarn dev
